google_sql_database_instance.description: Creates a new SQL database instance in Google Cloud SQL.

region.description: The region the instance will sit in. Note, Cloud SQL is not

settings.description: The settings to use for the database. The

name.description: A name for this whitelist entry.

master_instance_name.description: The name of the instance that will act as

project.description: The ID of the project in which the resource belongs. If it

root_password.description: Initial root password. Required for MS SQL Server, ignored by MySQL and PostgreSQL.

tier.description: The machine type to use. See [tiers](https://cloud.google.com/sql/docs/admin-api/v1beta4/tiers)

activation_policy.description: This specifies when the instance should be

authorized_gae_applications.description: This property is only applicable to First Generation instances.

availability_type.description: This specifies whether a PostgreSQL instance

crash_safe_replication.description: This property is only applicable to First Generation instances.

disk_autoresize.description: Configuration to increase storage size automatically.  Note that future `terraform apply` calls will attempt to resize the disk to the value specified in `disk_size` - if this is set, do not set `disk_size`.

disk_size.description: The size of data disk, in GB. Size of a running instance cannot be reduced but can be increased.

disk_type.description: The type of data disk: PD_SSD or PD_HDD.

pricing_plan.description: Pricing plan for this instance, can only be `PER_USE`.

replication_type.description: This property is only applicable to First Generation instances.

user_labels.description: A set of key/value user label pairs to assign to the instance.

value.description: A CIDR notation IPv4 or IPv6 address that is allowed to

binary_log_enabled.description: True if binary logging is enabled. If

enabled.description: True if backup configuration is enabled.

ipv4_enabled.description: Whether this Cloud SQL instance should be assigned

private_network.description: The VPC network from which the Cloud SQL

require_ssl.description: True if mysqld should default to `REQUIRE X509`

follow_gae_application.description: A GAE application whose zone to remain

day.description: Day of week (`1-7`), starting on Monday

hour.description: Hour of day (`0-23`), ignored if `day` not set

ca_certificate.description: PEM representation of the trusted CA's x509

client_certificate.description: PEM representation of the slave's x509

client_key.description: PEM representation of the slave's private key. The

dump_file_path.description: Path to a SQL file in GCS from which slave

failover_target.description: Specifies if the replica is the failover target.

sslCipher.description: Permissible ciphers for use in SSL encryption.

verify_server_certificate.description: True if the master's common name

self_link.description: The URI of the created resource.

connection_name.description: The connection name of the instance to be used in

service_account_email_address.description: The service account email address assigned to the

ip_address.0.time_to_retire.description: The time this IP address will be retired, in RFC
